Hello Child!

Today is your birthday! You are 10! Did you know that a computer would read that as 2!!

Can you decode this message?

01001000 01100001 01110000 01110000
01111001 00100000 01000010 01101001
01110010 01110100 01101000 01100100
01100001 01111001 00100000 01001000
01100001 01111001 01101100 01100101
01111001 00100001
